title: Does these items and runes stack with healing and shielding ?
body:
Ardent Censer - Unique: +10% heal and shield power
Mikael's Crucible - Unique: +20% heal and shield power
Forbidden Idol - Unique: +5% heal and shield power
Revitalize (Rune) - Grants 5% Heal and Shield Power. 

Will it give you 40% Heal and Shield if you buy these 2 items?

And if yes? Then if Healing is 200 does it means it will incrase to 280?

replies.body:
its probably multiplicative too not additive

1.1x1.2x1.05x1.05=1.4553
If they don't say UNIQUE next to them than yes
